it. So this time, again, they probably don’t need it.”
3.  After Congress passes a military draft during a war, an opponent says, “If
members of Congress were eligible for the draft, they would not vote for
it. So we must not really need a draft.”
4.  Of course, the party in power is opposed to term limits. That’s just
because they want to stay in power.
5.  The main opposition to tax reductions comes from people who depend on
